member.name: M:CryptoWebAPI.Controllers.CryptoQuoteController.Login
member.summary: Used for requesting a token to mock an authorized front-end app
member.returns: A JWT token to be used in the GET crypto quote endpoint

member.name: M:CryptoWebAPI.Controllers.CryptoQuoteController.Ping
member.returns: An OKResult if the app is alive

member.name: M:CryptoWebAPI.Controllers.CryptoQuoteController.GetQuote(System.String)
member.returns: The quotes in different currencies for the user input crypto symbol and the user email.
